CMArticle.name: Press Release - Chef Corp. Announces Record Quarter Q1 2016 Article
CMArticle.title: Chef Corp. Announces Record Quarter

div.p: Chef Corp. today published results for its fiscal 2015 second quarter ended March 26, 2015. The Company achieved a record quarterly revenue of $83.9 million and a record quarterly net profit of $22 million. The previous quarter has seen a revenue of $72.1 million and net profit of $28.1 million. International sales accounted for 44 percent of the quarter’s revenue.
These results were largely garnered by a record revenue from the Chef Corp. Financing branch which helps entrepreneurs design and build the quality kitchens they need for success.

Chef Corp. today published results for its fiscal 2015 second quarter ended March 26, 2015. The Company achieved a record quarterly revenue of $83.9 million and a record quarterly net profit of $22 million. The previous quarter has seen a revenue of $72.1 million and net profit of $28.1 million. International sales accounted for 44 percent of the quarter’s revenue.
These results were largely garnered by a record revenue from the Chef Corp. Financing branch which helps entrepreneurs design and build the quality kitchens they need for success.

“The demand for Chef Corp. kitchens has seen an unbelievable raise and we would like to thank our customers for that,” said Brian Fraser, Chef Corp. CEO. “The ingenuity and craftsmanship of our design team has proven again that quality is what matters, and that's where Chef Corp. delivers.”

Since 1999, our more than 125,000 customers have come to know Chef Corp as their premier provider to find virtually anything needed for the restaurant supply industry. We are committed to delivering you expert solutions with the personal attention you deserve.

Our services range from commercial kitchen supplies, including our special dedication to kitchen lighting; to our consumer offering, Perfect Chef, an omni-channel shop and customer magazine that delivers seasonal news, ideas, recipes, and handpicked products to inspire cooks and connoisseurs of the good life – in all of its forms.
